rationale: The segment does not contain an intensifier or comparative adjective directly modifying a risk-adjective.
Factual reporting of action and numbers. No high-potency language used.
The segment discusses future action ('will be killed') which is not realised impact.
No loaded rhetorical question is present.
Reports culling numbers and reason without explicit calming language.
The segment reports culling action, containing no bare negation or calming cue.
Describes a planned response measure/safeguard ("will be killed in order to prevent the virus from spreading") without active reassurance.
